full_summary:
## Thermostat Emulator Procurement Opportunity
### Procurement Notice

#### Amendment Note
The [read more link](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16664470?extsite=MTY2NjQ0NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) includes an updated response deadline. Submissions must be received by **July 10, 2023 at 14:00 EDT**.

#### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of Natural Resources Canada - CanmetENERGY, is seeking a Thermostat Emulator for climate-controlled testing in the Climate Controlled Test Facility.

#### Key Details
* **Contract Number:** WS3972519215-Doc4065625021
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3972519215
* **Publication Date:** June 22, 2023
* **Closing Date:** July 10, 2023 at 14:00 EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 1, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 21, 2024
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Requirements
The successful supplier must demonstrate that their product/equipment/system meets the specifications listed in the ACAN document. Suppliers interested in this procurement opportunity must submit their statement of capabilities by the response deadline.

#### Contact Information
For inquiries or further information, please contact:
Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali
yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Language and Attachment
Only duly filled and completed response forms submitted through Ariba Discovery will be considered for this procurement opportunity. No other documentation or attachments (except those specifically requested in the evaluation process) will be accepted. All communications concerning this tender should be made through Ariba Discovery.
